titles.title: To repeal the Truth in Savings Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs.
Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E895-896)

committee.name: House Committee on Banking, Finance + Urban Affrs

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Credit and Insurance.

committee.name: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary: 4/2/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation Improvement Act of 1991 to repeal the Truth in Savings Act. Declares that no person shall be liable for violations of such Act which occurred before the date of enactment of this Act.
